verbs.description: [ARG0: attorney] to [V: pay] [ARG1: multi - million dollar judgement] [ARGM-TMP: after hypnotizing clients to take advantage of them sexually] a disgraced lawyer convicted of hypnotizing female clients to take sexual advantage of them is ordered to pay a multi - million dollar judgement to one of his victims a judge ruled in favor of the woman who filed a civil lawsuit against him lorain county attorney lorain lorain county ohio david corrado judge lee sinclair lorain ohio michael r fine michael fine
